revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #09 Persim |image = [[File:Persim.png]] |caption = The more this Berry absorbs energy from sunlight, the more vividly colorful it grows. |growtime = 1m 30s |harvest = 5 berries |replant = 40% |mutation = 2% |points = 10 |flavor =
*10 spicy *10 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Persim''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Pecha]] and at least 1 [[Oran]].
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
